name: Deep Gnome
description: The Deep Gnome has dark, stone-colored skin, allowing it to blend into its subterranean surroundings. They are skilled miners and craftsmen, known for their intricate machinery and traps.
memorable: Skilled in stealth and magic, with abilities to confuse and incapacitate foes, making them formidable opponents despite their small size.
goals: To mine precious gems and minerals while protecting their hidden cities from threats.
relations: Often wary of outsiders, they may interact with other subterranean creatures or those seeking underground treasures.
environment: Typically found in the Underdark, in hidden cities and mining sites.
strengths: Exceptional at stealth, particularly in rocky terrain, and has advantages against magical attacks.
weaknesses: Low Charisma score can hinder social interactions and persuasion attempts.
attacks: Utilizes a War Pick for melee attacks and Crystalline Darts for ranged combat, dealing consistent piercing damage.
most_powerful_ability: Discordant Shatter, which can incapacitate multiple enemies, especially effective against spellcasters.
senses: Possesses darkvision up to 120 feet, aiding in navigation through poorly lit environments.
skills: Proficient in Stealth, allowing them to remain undetected during encounters.
additional_information: Gnome Cunning grants advantage against magic saves.
Stone Camouflage enhances Stealth in rocky areas.
Uses infused crystals for offensive and defensive actions.
Crystalline Flash blinding reaction to incoming attacks.
Cunning hunters that excel in ambush tactics.
